menu_option_descriptions.direct_login: Standard way, login with email and password. Try this first.
menu_option_descriptions.redirect_login: If direct login fails, use this method which requires browser interaction.

direct_login_2fa.title: 2FA Verification
direct_login_2fa.description: Enter the 2FA code sent to your phone.

redirect_login.title: Redirect Login
redirect_login.description:
1. Open the following URL in your browser:

{auth_url}

2. Complete the login process (including CAPTCHA and 2FA).
3. After login, the browser will try to redirect to a URL starting with 'msauth://...'. This redirect will fail.
4. Open your browser's developer console (F12) and copy the failed redirect URL.
5. Paste the URL below.

reauth.title: Re-authentication Required
reauth.description: Please re-authenticate your Lynk & Co account.

error.invalid_redirect_uri: The provided redirect URI is invalid. It should start with 'msauth://prod.lynkco.app.crisp.prod/'.
error.invalid_email: The provided email is invalid. Please check and try again.
error.invalid_2fa_code: The provided 2FA code is invalid. Please check and try again.
error.login_failed: Login failed. This may be due to a CAPTCHA. Please try the Redirect Login method instead.
error.token_error: Failed to obtain tokens from the redirect URI. Please try again.
error.two_factor_auth_failed: Two-factor authentication failed. Please try again.

abort.no_vins_found: No vehicles found for your account. Please make sure you have a vehicle registered with Lynk & Co.
